<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cleansing Light](/Feats.aspx?ID=3981) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Kashrishi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=462" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 45

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

A burst of light from your horn cleanses your allies of ailments and sends your foes reeling. You and all allies in a 20-foot emanation benefit from a 4th-level [_restoration_](/Spells.aspx?ID=258) spell. All enemies within the emanation are [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) until the end of your next turn.
name: Cleansing Light
